name: Phantasmal Pixel Pirouette
description:
On a lazy day, Sumireko Usami and Mamizou Futatsuiwa inadvertently meet in Tokyo. Having nothing better to do, the challenge of "I will kick your ass at the arcade" arises. Will our bake-danuki hero defeat the psychic menace at her own game!? Download free from your favorite online retailer (here) for any computer (only windows)!

Made in 72 hours for Touhou Game Jam 6.
